zh.activity_deposit_content_one: 1. 活动时间：首充时间XXXX，用户从自己的首充时间起14天后为活动结束时间；
zh.activity_deposit_content_two: 2. 仅限活动期间首次对平台账户ETH充值有效；
zh.activity_deposit_content_three: 3. 用户需在首充后14天内，完成与首充相同数额的投注额才能获得奖励，最高返奖1000ETH；
zh.activity_deposit_content_four: 4. 每个用户只能参与一次活动，同IP、MAC、邮箱用户将视作同一用户；
zh.activity_deposit_content_five: 5. 根据用户首充及完成投注额的比例进行返奖，具体返奖比例如下：
zh.activity_deposit_content_six: 6. 活动结束后，投注额未达到首充额的用户获得投注额1%的奖励，投注额小于0.3ETH的无法获得奖励；
zh.activity_deposit_content_seven: 7. 系统将在活动结束1小时后，对未领取奖励的用户逐一发奖。
zh.activity_deposit_top_title: 充值投注、巨额返奖、最高返1000ETH！

en.activity_deposit_content_two: 2. Only the first deposit of ETH to your account during the activity time is effective;
en.activity_deposit_content_three: 3. Within 14 days of the first deposit, the user will only be rewarded an amount equivalent to the first deposit on placing a prediction; the maximum reward is 1000ETH;
en.activity_deposit_content_four: 4. Each user can participate in only one activity; users with the same IP, MAC, and email address will be treated as a single user;
en.activity_deposit_content_five: 5. Reward distribution is subject to first deposit and prediction amount; the details are as below:
en.activity_deposit_content_six: 6. After the event, any user who has not reached the required amount similar to the first deposit will be rewarded the equivalent of 1% of the stake amount, and any stake below 0.3ETH will not be rewarded;
en.activity_deposit_content_seven: 7. The system will reward winners who have not received their awards one by one within 1 hour of the end of the event.4ees
en.activity_deposit_top_title: Deposit, Predict, Get Huge Returns of up to 1000ETH!

ko.activity_deposit_content_two: 2. 이벤트 시간 내 플랫폼 계정에 ETH를 처음 충전하는 경우에만 유효합니다；
ko.activity_deposit_content_three: 3. 첫 충전 후 14일 내에 첫 충전 금액과 같은 금액으로 베팅할 경우 보상을 받게 되며, 최대 보상은 1000ETH입니다；
ko.activity_deposit_content_four: 4. 유저는 1인당 1회 이벤트 참여가 가능하며, 동일한 IP, MAC, 이메일 주소 사용 시, 동일한 유저로 간주됩니다；
ko.activity_deposit_content_five: 5. 보상는 첫 충전 및 완료된 베팅 금액에 따라 배당되며, 상세 내역은 다음과 같습니다：
ko.activity_deposit_content_six: 6. 이벤트가 끝난 후 베팅 금액이 최초 충전 금액보다 적을 경우 베팅한 금액의 1%보상을 획득하며 베팅금액이 0.3ETH보다  적을 경우 보상을 받을 수 없습니다；
ko.activity_deposit_content_seven: 7. 시스템은 이벤트 끝난 1시간 후에 보상을  수령하지 않은 유저에게 차례로 보상을 드리겠습니다.

ja.activity_register_title_close: イベント・ルールをチェック
ja.activity_deposit_content_two: 2. イベント期間中限定、初めてプラットフォームのアカウントへETHをチャージする行為のみ有効；
ja.activity_deposit_content_three: 3. ユーザーは、最初のチャージ完了から14日以内に、ベッティング金額は最初のチャージ金額と同じ金額でボーナスをもらえる、最高額は1000ETH；
ja.activity_deposit_content_four: 4. 各ユーザーは1回のみイベントに参加可能で、IP、MAC、メールの同じユーザーは同一ユーザーとみなされる；
ja.activity_deposit_content_five: 5. 初チャージ及びベッティング金額による、ボーナスの比例配分は以下の通りです：
ja.activity_deposit_content_six: 6. イベント終了後、ベッティング金額は最初のチャージ金額に達していないユーザーが、ベッティング金額の1%ボーナスをもらえる、ベッティング金額は0.3ETHより低いユーザーがボーナスをもらえない；
ja.activity_deposit_content_seven: 7. システムはイベント終了1時間後に、まだボーナスを受け取っていないユーザーに逐一支給する。
ja.activity_deposit_top_title: チャージとベッティング、高額なボーナス、最高額はなんと1000ETH！

ru.activity_deposit_content_two: 2. Only the first deposit of ETH to your account during the activity time is effective;
ru.activity_deposit_content_three: 3. Within 14 days of the first deposit, the user will only be rewarded an amount equivalent to the first deposit on placing a prediction; the maximum reward is 1000ETH;
ru.activity_deposit_content_four: 4. Each user can participate in only one activity; users with the same IP, MAC, and email address will be treated as a single user;
ru.activity_deposit_content_five: 5. Reward distribution is subject to first deposit and prediction amount; the details are as below:
ru.activity_deposit_content_six: 6. After the event, any user who has not reached the required amount similar to the first deposit will be rewarded the equivalent of 1% of the stake amount, and any stake below 0.3ETH will not be rewarded;
ru.activity_deposit_content_seven: 7. The system will reward winners who have not received their awards one by one within 1 hour of the end of the event.
ru.activity_deposit_top_title: Deposit, Predict, Get Huge Returns of up to 1000ETH!

zh-Hant.activity_deposit_content_two: 2. 僅限活動期間首次對平臺帳戶ETH充值有效；
zh-Hant.activity_deposit_content_three: 3. 用戶需在首充後14天內，完成與首充相同數額的投注額才能獲得獎勵，最高返獎1000ETH；
zh-Hant.activity_deposit_content_four: 4. 每個用戶只能參與一次活動，同IP、MAC、郵箱用戶將視作同一用戶；
zh-Hant.activity_deposit_content_five: 5. 根據使用者首充及完成投注額的比例進行返獎，具體返獎比例如下：
zh-Hant.activity_deposit_content_six: 6. 活動結束後，投注額未達到首充額的用戶獲得投注額1%的獎勵，投注額小於0.3ETH的無法獲得獎勵；
zh-Hant.activity_deposit_content_seven: 7. 系統將在活動結束1小時後，對未領取獎勵的用戶逐一發獎。
zh-Hant.activity_deposit_top_title: 充值投注、巨額返獎、最高返1000ETH！
